actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to improve pension benefits for World War I veterans and for surviving spouses of such veterans.

summary.text: Amends Federal veterans' benefits provisions to add $2,400 (currently $800) annually in such benefits to veterans of World War I who were not provided with the educational and home-loan benefits that were provided to veterans of later periods. Increases by $800 annually the rate of pension payable to a qualifying surviving spouse of a veteran of World War I.

titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to improve pension benefits for World War I veterans and for surviving spouses of such veterans.
